name: Don't Let the Bookbugs Bite!
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 50 - the theme was "Delay the Inevitable."

Controls:
Arrow keys: Move
D key: Drag bookshelves
Mouse: Throw shelves around
(The mouse option mostly just for fun - it might break the game balance a bit.)

I didn't realise this jam was on until a couple of hours before the event, and I spent most of the first day playing around with GDevelop's physics engine so had to slap together the art and sound pretty quickly. That said, I mostly wanted to take part to have a play around with that physics engine so I figure it was a weekend well spent!
